name: Born To Die (Born-To-Die)
description:
Born To Die Game (BTDG) is a Free To Play (F2P) AAA-quality First-person-shooter (FPS) NFT Game of the blockchain. It features rich high-definition visuals, graphics and Hollywood-grade cinematic effects. BTDG bring together the best of gaming & play-to-earn. The gameplay via first-person or third-person game mode with replays gives you an immersive 360-degree experience.

BTDG has been 2-years into development. Unlike most projects, we have taken out the riskiest and hard part of a play-to-earn project - game development even before building the community or launching the NFTs. With 85% of the development complete, it gives BTDG an edge to fast track the roadmap with the game launch as early as the first quarter of 2023.

BTDG has many firsts: gameplay, game economics, community-focused project. It is powered by one of the most advanced AI engines.
